name: Spinzizzle Free
description:
****The 1st Day Reviews are IN!!!!****

"Spinzizzle is an amazingly fresh puzzle game that provides brand new challenge unseen in the App Store....Spinzizzle is one of the very best puzzle games in the App Store that is a must buy." - AppAdvice

"Spinzizzle - A cool puzzle game with a weird name" - TouchArcade

*******************

Spinzizzle is the non-stop ball-spinning puzzle-thriller of a game you’ve been waiting for! Spin, drop, and collect colored balls in the right sequence to maximize the explosion (and your score)!

And just when you think you’ve got it down, we throw some wildcard balls at you to keep you guessing and wanting more!

If you like this one, check out the full version and find out if you have what it takes to become a Spinzizzle Mastizzle!

Spinzizzle Free delivers:
- 7 levels of gameplay
- Wildcard Balls
- OpenFeint integration
- Amazing graphics
- Explosive gameplay

Stay up-to-date with gaming news, releases, hints & contests by Becoming our Fan on Facebook or Following us on Twitter. Fo'shizzle!
